001import java.util.*;
002
003/**
004 * @author  Pavithra Subramaniyam;  pavithra.subramaniyam@tuni.fi;
005 * <p>This class has 3 different classes               
006 * <p>which are main class, startGame class and FruitName class 
007 * <p>It is a public so that we can access it from out of the class
008 * <p>This will ask the bet amount from the user and return a string based on the winning condition
009 *                     
010 */
011
012public class SlotGame
013{
014
015    /**
016    * <p>main class
017    *<p> this class will call another class which is startGame
018    *                         
019    */
020
021 
022    public static void main(String[] args) {
023 
024        new SlotGame().startGame();
025    }
026
027    /**
028    *<p> starts the game and prints the fruit name as per the random number selection
029    * <p>ask for the user input as bet amount
030    *<p> after getting the bet amount, the game starts and the fruit names will be printed
031    * <p>the next class will be called to know the winning result
032    * <p>again user needs to enter y/n to continue/quit the game                       
033    */
034
035 
036    public void startGame() {
037        Scanner keyboard = new Scanner(System.in);
038        // RandomFruit random = new RandomFruit();
039        String cont = "y";
040        int coin = 0;
041        int totalEntered = 0;
042        int a;
043        int b;
044        int c;
045        int n;
046        int amountWon = 0;
047        int dubs = coin * 2;
048        int trips = coin * 4;
049 
050        while (cont.equals("y"))
051        {
052            RandomFruit firstNum = new RandomFruit();
053            RandomFruit SecondNum = new RandomFruit();
054            RandomFruit thirdNum = new RandomFruit();
055            RandomFruit numbers = new RandomFruit();
056            a = firstNum.GetRandom(7)+0;
057            b = SecondNum.GetRandom(7)+0;
058            c = thirdNum.GetRandom(7)+0;
059            n = numbers.GetRandom(991)+10;
060            totalEntered += coin;
061            System.out.println("How much would you like to bet? ");
062            coin = keyboard.nextInt();
063            // System.out.println("coin is"+ coin);
064            cont = keyboard.nextLine();
065            System.out.println("Game starts...");
066 
067            switch (a) 
068            {
069                case 0:
070                    System.out.println("Lemon");
071                    break;
072                case 1:
073                    System.out.println("Cherry");
074                    break;
075                case 2:
076                    System.out.println("Banana");
077                    break;
078                case 3:
079                    System.out.println("Melon");
080                    break;
081                case 4:
082                    System.out.println("Orange");
083                    break;
084                case 5:
085                    System.out.println("Plum");
086                    break;
087                case 6:
088                    System.out.println("Bar");
089                    break;
090            }
091 
092            switch (b) 
093            {
094                case 0:
095                    System.out.println("Lemon");
096                    break;
097                case 1:
098                    System.out.println("Cherry");
099                    break;
100                case 2:
101                    System.out.println("Banana");
102                    break;
103                case 3:
104                    System.out.println("Melon");
105                    break;
106                case 4:
107                    System.out.println("Orange");
108                    break;
109                case 5:
110                    System.out.println("Plum");
111                    break;
112                case 6:
113                    System.out.println("Bar");
114                    break;
115            }
116 
117            switch (c) 
118            {
119                case 0:
120                    System.out.println("Lemon");
121                    break;
122                case 1:
123                    System.out.println("Cherry");
124                    break;
125                case 2:
126                    System.out.println("Banana");
127                    break;
128                case 3:
129                    System.out.println("Melon");
130                    break;
131                case 4:
132                    System.out.println("Orange");
133                    break;
134                case 5:
135                    System.out.println("Plum");
136                    break;
137                case 6:
138                    System.out.println("Bar");
139                    break;
140            }
141
142            new SlotGame().FruitName(a, b, c);
143 
144            System.out.println("Continue? y/n ");
145            cont = keyboard.nextLine();
146        }
147    }
148
149    /**
150    * returns the winning results
151    * <p> getting the parameter values from RandomFruit class, then returns the winning results based on the condition
152    * 
153    * @param    a   random number from RandomFruit class
154    * @param    b   random number from RandomFruit class
155    * @param    c   random number from RandomFruit class
156    * @return   string, winning condition
157    */
158
159    public String FruitName(int a,int b,int c)
160    {
161        
162
163            if (a != b && a != c && b != c)
164            {
165                System.out.println("You have won $0");
166                return "No matches found";
167            }
168            else if (a == 6 && b == 6 && c == 6)
169            {
170                System.out.println("Congratulations,You have won $100");
171                return "Congratulations,You have won $100";
172 
173            }
174            else if (a == b || a == c || b == c)
175            {
176               
177                System.out.println("Congratulations, you have won 50$");
178              
179                return "Congratulations, you have won 50$";
180                   
181            }
182            
183            return "nothing";
184        
185    }
186}
